title: Nuclei Isolation for SNARE-seq2

authors.name: Carter Palmer
authors.affiliation: University of California, San Diego, and Sanford Burnham Prebys Medical Discovery Institute

authors.name: Christine Liu
authors.affiliation: University of California, San Diego, and Sanford Burnham Prebys Medical Discovery Institute

authors.name: Jerold Chun
authors.affiliation: Sanford Burnham Prebys Medical Discovery Institute

source.description:
Nuclei Extraction Buffer (NEB):
ABCDE
1 Final Concentration Chemical to Add Stock Concentration
2 Sucrose 320 mM 5.48g Solid
3 Magnesium Acetate 3 mM 32.16mg Solid
4 CaCl2 5 mM 50µl 5M Stock
5 EDTA 100 µM 10µl 0.5M Stock
6 Tris-HCl pH 8 10 mM 500µl 1M Stock
7 Triton X-100 0.1 % 500µl 10% Stock
8  MilliQ Water Bring to 50ml
9 RNase Inhibitor 80 U/ml 100µl 40,000U/ml
10Protease Inhibitor Tablet 1 Tablet

ABCDE
1 Final Concentration Chemical to Add Stock Concentration
2 Sucrose 320 mM 5.48g Solid
3 Magnesium Acetate 3 mM 32.16mg Solid
4 CaCl2 5 mM 50µl 5M Stock
5 EDTA 100 µM 10µl 0.5M Stock
6 Tris-HCl pH 8 10 mM 500µl 1M Stock
7 Triton X-100 0.1 % 500µl 10% Stock
8  MilliQ Water Bring to 50ml
9 RNase Inhibitor 80 U/ml 100µl 40,000U/ml
10Protease Inhibitor Tablet 1 Tablet
Remove tissue from -80oC storage and place on ice.
Image the tissue rapidly in front of a ruler
Add 1ml of ice cold NEB to the tissue and incubate on ice for
During the incubation, wash the homogenizer with MilliQ water, 10% bleach, 70% EtOH, and MilliQ water again
Rinse homogenizer with 1ml of ice cold NEB
Once the incubation is complete, add 1 ml of fresh NEB to the homogenizer and transfer the tissue and the 1ml of NEB it is in to the homogenizer
Homogenize the tissue using ~20 compressions with the pestle, or until the tissue is entirely dissociated, this step can be variable
Pass nuclei suspension through 50 micron filter into a 15 ml conical tube, wash filter with another 4ml of NEB
Wait for
Centrifuge the samples
Carefully aspirate the supernatant and slowly resuspend the pellet in 1ml of NEB
Gently add another 9 ml of NEB to the sample
Centrifuge the samples
Aspirate the supernatant and slowly resuspend the samples in 1ml of PBSE + Sucrose
Gently add another 5 ml of PBSE + Sucrose
Centrifuge the samples

PBSE + Sucrose:
ABCDE
1 Final Concentration Chemical to Add Stock Concentration
2 Sucrose 320 mM 5.48g Solid
3 EGTA 250 µM 25µl 0.5M
4 1x PBS pH 7.4 Bring to 50ml
5 RNase Inhibitor 40 U/ml 50µl 40,000U/ml
6Protease Inhibitor Tablet 1 Tablet

ABCDE
1 Final Concentration Chemical to Add Stock Concentration
2 Sucrose 320 mM 5.48g Solid
3 EGTA 250 µM 25µl 0.5M
4 1x PBS pH 7.4 Bring to 50ml
5 RNase Inhibitor 40 U/ml 50µl 40,000U/ml
6Protease Inhibitor Tablet 1 Tablet

PBSE + BSA:
ABCDE
1 Final Concentration Chemical to Add Stock Concentration
2 BSA 1% 500mg Solid
3 EGTA 250 µM 25µl 0.5M
4 1x PBS pH 7.4 Bring to 50ml
5 RNase Inhibitor 40 U/ml 50µl 40,000U/ml
6Protease Inhibitor Tablet 1 Tablet

ABCDE
1 Final Concentration Chemical to Add Stock Concentration
2 BSA 1% 500mg Solid
3 EGTA 250 µM 25µl 0.5M
4 1x PBS pH 7.4 Bring to 50ml
5 RNase Inhibitor 40 U/ml 50µl 40,000U/ml
6Protease Inhibitor Tablet 1 Tablet

Aspirate all but approximately
of the PBSE+Sucrose, and gently resuspend the nuclei pellet in the remaining volume
While gently vortexing, add 5ml of 0.5% Formaldehyde diluted in 1X PBS
Fix for 10 min on ice
Centrifuge the samples
Aspirate the supernatant and slowly resuspend the samples in 1ml of PBSE + Sucrose
Centrifuge the samples
Aspirate the supernatant and slowly resuspend the samples in 1ml of PBSE + BSA
Gently add another 10ml of PBSE + BSA
Centrifuge the samples
Make 1ml/sample of PBSE + BSA + DAPI by adding DAPI at a final concentration of 1.25 µg/ml to PBSE + BSA. This is a 1:4000 dilution from a DAPI stock at 5mg/ml
Aspirate the supernatant and slowly resuspend the samples in 1ml of PBSE + BSA + DAPI
Pass nuclei suspension through 50 micron filter into a FACS tube, gently tap on table to get all nuclei through the filter
Use the DAPI singlet peak to sort singlet nuclei events into a 2ml low binding eppendorf tube.
Store all samples on ice until SNARE-seq processing begins. Do not store for longer 4 hours before processing.

materials.name: Protease Inhibitor Tablets cOmplete Mini EDTA free

description: This protocol is intended to be used for the isolation of nuclei from fresh-frozen brain tissue in preparation for analysis by Single-Nucleus Chromatin Accessibility and mRNA Expression sequencing (SNARE-seq). It has been applied to tissues from mouse, marmoset, and human.
